channel.title: Portal Problem
channel.description: i added this portal in my server to teleport to Admin Town But Its Not Teleporting me To The Admin can some 1 help

item.title: Portal Problem
item.dc:creator: @xKxIxRxK xKxIxRxK
item.description:
@xKxIxRxK wrote:

heres what i added

makeGlobalObject(2796, 3433, 8987, 0, 10);//Owner Zone Portal

[code] case 1747: // owner portal
if(playerRights >= 3) {
teleportToX = 2332;
teleportToY = 3171;
sendMessage(“Welcome to the Owner’s Town.”);
sendMessage(“Made By The owner.”);
} else {
sendMessage(“Sorry You Are Not Owner or a co owner”);
sendMessage(“You May Have Luck If You Work For It”);

}[/code]

i dunno whats going on

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2008, 01:39:56 PM[/size][hr]can some 1 help please

item.title: Portal Problem
item.dc:creator: @bomb65 bomb65
item.description:
@bomb65 wrote:

hmm, well this is 1 of mine,

makeGlobalObject(2549, 3564, 2472, 0, 10); // portal,

case 2472: // Portal At Front.
teleportToX = 2507;
teleportToY = 4723;
sendMessage(“You TelePort To New Slayer Area!!”);
sendMessage(“Kill The Dark Beasts For Many Many Drops!!”);
break;

that works fine, so im not sure why it isnt working for you.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2008, 12:31:24 PM[/size][hr]im not sure about this, but maybe its ur -1? cuz mines 0 and it works fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Problem
item.dc:creator: @tomishere tomishere
item.description:
@tomishere wrote:

I have a similar problem. I’ll post the codes, see if you did the same thing as I did xkxixrxk. AFter I added case, still not working.

makeGlobalObject(2718, 4905, 2472, -1, 10); // varrock pk portal

this is where I want to add the portal.

case 2472: //portal
	teleportToX = 3244;
	teleportToY = 3522;
	break;

That is where I want it to teleport me.
But after I added that in, it won’t tele me.
Anyone care to point out the problem?

Read full topic
